sibling(s)-in-law (via Mark) | relationships = | aliases = }} '''Mrs. Robinson''' is the wife of [[Mark Robinson]]. She is mentioned in "[[The One With Princess Consuela]]" when [[Rachel Greene|Rachel]] returns from having dinner with Mark who offered her a job at Louis Vuitton in Paris. [[Ross Geller|Ross]] was jealous again until Rachel said Mark is married. She also said that Mrs. Robinson just had twins. ==Trivia== *It's possible that she is French since Mark was living in Paris with her. ==Appearances== *"[[The One With Princess Consuela]]" (First mentioned) [[Category:Friends Characters]] [[Category:Unseen Characters]] [[Category:Females]] [[Category:Mothers]] [[Category:Aunts]] [[Category:Characters]]
